give credit to your config if you use , I actually took my time to write this damn config<br>// I use the Logitech's MouseMan+ , IMO best mouse ever made, 10x better then those dam razers.<br><br><br>// ** Binds **<br><br>// Movement binds<br>bind w &quot;+forward&quot;<br>bind s &quot;+back&quot;<br>bind a &quot;+moveleft&quot;<br>bind d &quot;+moveright&quot;<br>bind mouse2 &quot;+moveup&quot;<br>bind e &quot;+movedown&quot;<br>bind q &quot;+speed&quot;<br>bind MOUSE1 &quot;+attack&quot;<br>bind MWHEELDOWN &quot;weapnext&quot;<br>bind MWHEELUP &quot;weapprev&quot;<br>bind f4 &quot;record&quot;<br>// Weapon binds<br>bind f &quot;weapon 7;sensitivity 1.6&quot;<br>bind c &quot;weapon 5;sensitivity 2.6&quot;<br>bind r &quot;weapon 6;sensitivity 2.2&quot;<br>bind v &quot;weapon 8;sensitivity 2.4&quot;<br>bind 1 &quot;weapon 1&quot;<br>bind 2 &quot;weapon 2;sensitivity 1.5&quot;<br>bind 3 &quot;weapon 3;sensitivity 1.6&quot;<br>bind 4 1;wait;record game1;wait;g_syncronousclients 0&quot;<br>bind f6 &quot;g_syncronousclients 1;wait;record game2;wait;g_syncronousclients 0&quot;<br>bind f7 &quot;g_syncronousclients 1;wait;record game3;wait;g_syncronousclients 0&quot;<br>bind f8 &quot;g_syncronousclients 1;wait;record game4;wait;g_syncronousclients 0&quot;<br>bind f9 &quot;team red&quot;<br>bind f10 &quot;team blue&quot;<br>bind f11 &quot;team s&quot;<br>bind f12 &quot;ready&quot;<br><br>// Talking<br>bind t &quot;messagemode&quot;                  <br>bind y &quot;messagemode2&quot;                  // Talk to your teamates only<br><br><br>// Remove player bob &nbsp;                 // Stops player from bobbing<br>seta cg_bobroll &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_bobpitch &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_bobup &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_runroll &quot;0&quot;<br>seta cg_runpitch &quot;0&quot;<br><br>// Other stuff<br>seta cg_drawtimer 1                  // draws in game timer to your screen<br>seta com_maxfps &quot;120&quot;                  // Maximum frames per second<br>seta cg_drawCrosshair &quot;5&quot;            // Just the dot others are too big<br>seta cg_marks &quot;0&quot;                        // Will leave marks off<br>seta r_flares &quot;0&quot;                        // makes fire and lights shiny , too shiny<br>seta r_fastsky &quot;0&quot;                  // Sky looks pretty and you can see through portals with this off<br>seta r_picmip &quot;13&quot;                        // game has more texture and detail It makes the game more fun Some people use r_picmip 5 for better railing It looks FUGLY tho<br>seta sex &quot;male&quot;                        // Im no bitch<br>seta cg_predictItems &quot;1&quot;            // Displays on screen what you just picked up  Like ammo<br>seta name &quot;b^4:^7Mon^4t^7y&quot;            // Your 0wn 1337 name goes here<br>seta rate &quot;25000&quot;                        // Rate for high speed modems or connections<br>seta snaps &quot;40&quot;                        // Ive heard it helps rail Not sure tho<br>seta model &quot;Mark&quot;            // This model is elite Green stands out also<br>seta m_filter &quot;0&quot;                        // Keep this to 0 if you use USB or ps2 with 200 mouse rate<br>seta cl_run &quot;1&quot;                        // Hmm HELLO of course you always want to run Unless you want a Rail up your ass<br>seta sensitivity &quot;1.9&quot;                  // Low sensitivity cuz I use mouse accel<br>seta cl_mouseAccel &quot;1.7&quot;            // Sets it so the more you move your mouse The faster it turns It does hurts your rail aim overall but I have to use it<br>seta cg_autoswitch &quot;0&quot;                  // You dont want to switch to a weapon when you pick it up do you?<br>seta com_blood &quot;0&quot;                  // Turns off blood It does get in the way<br>seta cg_shadows &quot;0&quot;                  // will leave shadows off , looks ugly on picmip 13<br>seta cg_drawGun &quot;0&quot;                  // Guns take up too much of the screen , take it off<br>seta cg_fov &quot;105&quot;                        // You can see more with a higher default field of view It may hurt railing though<br>seta cg_gibs &quot;0&quot;                        // Too many guts and brains flying everywhere from my gibbed opponents Cant see too good<br>seta cg_drawAttacker &quot;0&quot; &nbsp;           // Wont draw your opponent's name it takes up too much screen space<br>seta cg_drawAmmoWarning &quot;0&quot; &nbsp;           // tells you if your low on ammo the words take up too much screen space and its good to know when your going to run out without help<br>seta cg_drawTeamOverlay &quot;1&quot;            // Tells you were your team is<br>seta cg_forceModel &quot;1&quot;                  // Everybody looks like the modle you are using<br>seta cg_lagometer &quot;0&quot;                  // It takes up too much space on the screen and its ugly as hell<br>seta cg_drawRewards &quot;0&quot;                  // displays a reward if you hit 2 rails in a row and such well since I do it all the time it takes up to much space
